definition: to sow/to scatter/to spread/to broadcast/Taiwan pr. [bo4]

sentences.english: I hope that, as you learn about podcasting, you'll share my enthusiasm.
sentences.chinese: 我希望您在学习播客的过程中能够分享我的激情。

sentences.english: The full, 57-minute podcast is highly recommended.
sentences.chinese: 我向各位大力推荐这部长达57分钟的播客。

sentences.english: The rest of the time I’m relying on shuffle and podcasts.
sentences.chinese: 其他情况下，我则倾向于听音乐和播客节目。

sentences.english: It was a consumer podcasting company.
sentences.chinese: 这是个消费者播客公司。

sentences.english: I had no interest in podcasting whatsoever.
In this Business English Podcast lesson, we’ll be continuing our series on business travel.
sentences.chinese: 在这节商务英语播客中，我们将继续我们的商务旅行。

sentences.english: If you have a multi-author blog, all the better.
sentences.chinese: 如果你有一个多作者的播客，更好。

sentences.english: How about a video blog? Or a podcast?
sentences.chinese: 不如尝试一下视频博客，或者播客？

sentences.english: Skip the lecture, download the podcast.
Play a live stream or download podcasts of past interviews broadcasted on BFM.
sentences.chinese: 播放实时流或下载BFM播出过去采访的播客。

sentences.english: Deutsche Welle Global Best Podcast 2005 winner.
sentences.chinese: 德国之声2005年全球最佳播客得主。

sentences.english: Almost any mixer made for podcasting or related activities will do.
sentences.chinese: 几乎所有的播客或相关活动的话，才能混频器。

sentences.english: This tutorial walks you through the creation of your first podcast.
sentences.chinese: 本教程带领您创建您的第一个播客。

sentences.english: I know podcasters who struggle to produce one podcast a week.
sentences.chinese: 我认识每周挣扎着做一个播客的播客人。

sentences.english: Apple blocked a podcasting app in 2008.
sentences.chinese: 苹果在2008年拦截了播客应用。

definition: audiobook/recording of a person reading the text of a book
